name: anotea
description: Anotea : l'advisor de la formation ! Accédez aux avis des anciens stagiaires pour mieux choisir sa formation !
author: Loïc Guillois <loic@fitlab.fr>

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run db:memory:stop; npm run db:memory:start && ANOTEA_MONGODB_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27018/anotea?w=1 mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 5000 test/integration
scripts.test:integration:log:error: npm run db:memory:stop; npm run db:memory:start && ANOTEA_LOG_LEVEL=error ANOTEA_MONGODB_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27018/anotea?w=1 mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 50000 test/integration
scripts.test:integration:log:info: npm run db:memory:stop; npm run db:memory:start && ANOTEA_LOG_LEVEL=info ANOTEA_MONGODB_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27018/anotea?w=1 mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 50000 test/integration
scripts.test:coverage: npm run db:memory:stop; npm run db:memory:start && ANOTEA_MONGODB_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27018/anotea?w=1 nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 5000 test
scripts.test:all: npm run db:memory:stop; npm run db:memory:start && ANOTEA_MONGODB_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27018/anotea?w=1 npm run test
scripts.smtp:start: docker rm anotea-smtp; docker run -d --name anotea-smtp -p 1025:1025 -p 8025:8025 mailhog/mailhog
scripts.db:start: docker rm anotea-db; docker run -d --name anotea-db -p 27017:27017 -v $(pwd)/../.data/mongodb/db:/data/db:cached mongo:4.2.2-bionic --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB 1
